implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Defines the REST API endpoint '/tasks' for creating a new task. Receives TaskCreate input and delegates creation to the TaskService.
implementation.name: create_task
implementation.pseudo_code:
ON HTTP POST /tasks WITH TaskCreate payload:
    TRY
        CALL task_service.create_task(task)
        RETURN created Task
    EXCEPT Exception as e
        RETURN HTTP 400 with error message

implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Handles business logic for creating a task. Logs the operation and delegates to TaskRepository for persistence.
implementation.name: TaskService.create_task
implementation.pseudo_code:
FUNCTION create_task(task_data):
    LOG 'Creating task for user: task_data.user_name'
    RETURN repository.add_task(task_data)

implementation.How_is_it_connected_to_implementation: Persists the new task in an in-memory list, assigns a unique ID, and logs creation.
implementation.name: TaskRepository.add_task
implementation.pseudo_code:
FUNCTION add_task(task_data):
    CREATE Task with new ID and task_data
    APPEND Task to _tasks list
    INCREMENT _id_counter
    LOG 'Task created: task'
    RETURN Task
